Articles.Content:
I recently downloaded some mods today (B9 Aerospace, Firespitter, etc.) but for some reason, whenever I make a ship with a mod cockpit (The M27 Overview cockpit, for example) it always spawns empty. I check the Crew section, and there are still kerbals assigned to the ship. This has happened with every modded cockpit in every mod I downloaded, so I'm stuck using the vanilla Command pods, which isn't something I'd prefer.

Long story short, whenever I use a mod cockpit, the kerbals don't appear inside, thus I can't use the rocket.

Help!

Edited July 17, 2014 by jamaicanviking

I'm trying to figure this out as well (in 25.0 and 0.90). On the launch pad, I imagine your stages do not list on the left either. This same problem occurs when I hook up the Netherdyne S1 Garden Module also. Pls let me know if you find the cause/fix.

Edited April 17, 2015 by Glasher
